title: Return to Florence
brief_description: When Florence flooded in 1966 the oily waters did terrible damage to the art treasures. This program shows the experts from many countries who, under the guidance of UNESCO, continue the slow, painstaking process of restoration. Research and commentary by Rex Keating. Music by Muir Mathieson.
